raw: Today 's Birthday , April 13 : Australian radio announcer Alan Jones ( 1941 - ) .

raw: Amid the coronavirus outbreak , Alan Jones has labelled the disease the " health version of global warming " even after going into isolation last month to prevent being infected .

raw: Alan Jones was born in Oakey , Queensland in 1943 and grew up on a dairy farm with siblings Robert and Colleen .
replaced: Jones was born in Oakey , Queensland in 1943 and grew up on a dairy farm with siblings Robert and Colleen .

raw: After leaving school , he trained as a teacher in Brisbane .
replaced: After leaving school , Jones trained as a teacher in Brisbane .

raw: While teaching , he studied part - time at the University of Queensland and graduated in 1967 with a Bachelor of Arts .
replaced: While teaching , Jones studied part - time at the University of Queensland and graduated in 1967 with a Bachelor of Arts .

raw: Jones went on to teach at the King 's School in Sydney where he also coached the rugby team .
replaced: Jones went on to teach at the King 's School in Sydney where Jones also coached the rugby team .

raw: In the 1970s , he ran a regional NSW airline called Skyways , studied at Oxford 's Worcester College and attempted a career in politics .
replaced: In the 1970s , Jones ran a regional NSW airline called Skyways , studied at Oxford 's Worcester College and attempted a career in politics .

raw: He worked as a speechwriter for Liberal prime minister Malcolm Fraser from 1979 to 1981 before moving to the Employers ' Federation of NSW .
replaced: Jones worked as a speechwriter for Liberal prime minister Malcolm Fraser from 1979 to 1981 before moving to the Employers ' Federation of NSW .

raw: Jones began as a radio commentator in 1985 with Sydney station 2UE .
replaced: Jones began as a radio commentator in 1985 with 2UE .

raw: He also coached the Wallabies to a Bledisloe Cup win in 1986 after a 39 - year drought .
replaced: Jones also coached the Wallabies to a Bledisloe Cup win in 1986 after a 39 - year drought .

raw: Two years later he was honoured with a Member of the General Division of the Order of Australia for services to rugby , followed by induction to the Australian sports hall of fame in 1989 .
replaced: Two years later Jones was honoured with a Member of the General Division of the Order of Australia for services to rugby , followed by induction to the Australian sports hall of fame in 1989 .

raw: Jones attracted thousands of dollars in fines for a range of defamation and other cases in his time at 2UE .
replaced: Jones attracted thousands of dollars in fines for a range of defamation and other cases in Jones time at 2UE .

raw: In 1999 , the Australian Broadcasting Authority began hearings into the cash - for - comment scandal where broadcasters allegedly passed off paid advertising as independent commentary .
replaced: In 1999 , the ABA began hearings into the cash - for - comment scandal where broadcasters allegedly passed off paid advertising as independent commentary .

raw: The following year , the ABA found Jones and then - colleague John Laws breached the Broadcasting Act and the radio code 95 times .
replaced: The following year , the ABA found Jones and then - colleague John Laws breached the Broadcasting Act and the radio code 95 times .

raw: As a result , 2UE was forced to abide by tougher regulations .
replaced: As a result , 2UE was forced to abide by tougher regulations .

raw: After contract extensions with 2UE ended in December 2001 , Jones signed up with radio station 2 GB the following year for a reported $ 4 million annual salary .

raw: In 2013 , Jones began hosting a political talk show on Sky News with former Labor senator Graham Richardson .

raw: Since 2017 , the show has been rebranded to Jones Co , which he co - hosts with Peta Credlin .
